alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 6:49AM EST until January 09 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of less than one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Pocahontas County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Watch for a glaze of ice from a period of light rain earlier this morning. Old patches of ice and packed snow may have become even more slick. One last round of freezing rain moving in this morning could bring an additional glaze of a few hundredths of an inch, before temperatures rise above freezing around 10 am.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. If the road looks wet, assume it is icy. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
